Fronsciers's Mission

To revolutionize academic publishing by creating a decentralized, transparent, and researcher-driven platform that eliminates traditional gatekeepers, accelerates knowledge dissemination, and ensures fair compensation for quality contributions through blockchain technology and tokenized incentives.
